name: Singularity (itch) (g0dz4ll027)
description: This is a project made by a group of 5 people for the course of video game design in IPB during an "interdisciplinary week" hosted in our college which its main purpose is to aproach a given theme voted by the students and trying to answer the main problems by developing a game or another app. The game is still in its early stage of development and there's still a bunch of content to be implemented. Stay tuned for some updates!
